options.message:
Hello,

 

We have sent you this email in response to your request to reset your password on company name.

 

To reset your password, please follow the link below:
Reset Password

Please ignore this email if you did not request a password change.

Freemind is proud to be the place to provide e-ecommerce solutions using the Magento 2 platform. We believe that innovation and creativity is the key to open a bright future for members of the company.













































Forgot your password?












Hey, we received a request to reset
your password.












Let’s get you a new one!









RESET MY PASSWORD










Didn’t request a password reset? You can
ignore this message.

















































































+84 908 007 074












This link will expire in the next 24
hours.Please feel free to contact
us at contact@freemind.vn.












Copyright© 2021
Freemind.


Privacy Policy
|
Terms & Conditions





































Designed with BEE

options.message:
Thank you for registering!

You have to confirm your email address. Please click on the link below.

<%= URL %>?confirmation=<%= CODE %>

Thanks.
